dungeons.name: Dark Cave
dungeons.description: A dark cave, filled with stalactites and stalagmites. The light from your lantern glints off of water dripping down the walls. You can't see more than.

dungeons.name: Mushroom Grove
dungeons.description: This cave has a vibrant atmosphere, with a slight haze in the air. Neon mushrooms line the walls.

dungeons.name: Forest Trail
dungeons.description: At the exit of the cave lies a light forest. An animal trail guides your path upwards.
